Description: I use Datawrapper to create brand-consistent charts, tables, maps, and interactive data visualization, such as the one you're on right now. I use Adobe Illustrator to design data-based infographics or static data points.

I use Abode AfterEffects for animating vector based graphics, data visualizations, illustrations, and icons for explainer videos, social promotional clips, and GIFs, with vector files being pre-worked in Illustrator.
For video editing and sequencing, including sounds effects, I use Adobe Premiere Pro, with animations being pre-edited in AfterEffects.
Most of my illustrations and vector graphics are created in Adobe Illustrator, with image files being pre-worked in Photoshop. I am also familiar with Figma and InkScape.
I use Adobe Illustartor for creating and customizing logos, icons and brand graphic elements.
I use Adobe InDesign for all typography, page design and document layout works, for screen and print.
For slideshow presentations templates, I can navigate the advanced commands for animations and transitions in Google Slides, Microsoft PowePoint, and Canva.
I use Blender for modeling, sculping, shading, animating, and rendering 3D files.
I create maps mainly in Datawrapper, while using AfterEffects for animating them and Google Earth Studio for 3D panoramic videos.
I use Adobe Photoshop to edit 360 photospehere photos for immersive virtual enviroments, and use Python's Spatial Media Metadata Injector for video and Web optimization.
I am familiar with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python (beginner).
I can use Excel's and Spreadsheet's web, math, and logical functions for automation and formatting purposes.
I am familiar with Google Analytics and web traffic rates and acquisition sources data.
I understand the functioning of metadata for search engine optimization and promotion purposes.
